function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sharp increase in daily new cases and total confirmed cases for London","Impact":"High transmission rate of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict social distancing measures, testing, and contact tracing","Technologies":"Digital contact tracing apps, testing technology, and monitoring systems","People":"Residents of London, healthcare workers, and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, healthcare institutions, and public health agencies"},{"Description":"High number of deaths related to COVID-19 in London","Impact":"High mortality rate and strain on healthcare system","Mitigation":"Enhanced medical facilities, early intervention, and public health awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Telehealth, remote monitoring devices, and medical supply chain management systems","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, and families of the deceased","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, public health agencies, and government"},{"Description":"Overcrowding and space issues in a city like London","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and difficulty in enforcing social distancing measures","Mitigation":"Urban planning for better living conditions, public health education, and community engagement","Technologies":"Smart city technology, urban analytics, and data-driven policy making","People":"City residents, urban planners, and policymakers","Owner":"City authorities, urban development organizations, and government"}]}
